name: Mom
dialog: P_name! Mom and Dad are here!

name: Mom
dialog: Looks like P_name has been doing well on Hope Island!

name: Dad
dialog: Yes, P_name seems to be having a lot of fun.

name: Dad
dialog: How was it living on this island?

name: 주인공
dialog: I became close with the friends on the island. We exercised and ate together.

name: Mom
dialog: So, P_name's expression brightened up and smiled a lot more than before.
비고: (과거의 모습과 현재의 모습을 Before-After로 띄워서 하나하나 비교한다.) 2컷 있음

name: Mom
dialog: Most importantly, you seem to be healthier and happier.

name: Dad
dialog: Then it's okay for P_name to stay on this island longer!

name: Mom
dialog: What does P_name think about it?

name: Mom
dialog: Mom and Dad approve as long as you're happy.

name: 주인공
dialog: I want to stay on Hope Island.

name: 주인공
dialog: I like my friends and all the adults on the island.
